cp_stars.name: Ironclad
cp_stars.tooltip_raw: Reduces your damage taken by direct damage attacks by 3% per stage.

cp_stars.name: Duelist's Rebuff
cp_stars.tooltip_raw: Reduces your damage taken by single target attacks by 3% per stage.

cp_stars.name: Bulwark
cp_stars.tooltip_raw: While you have a Shield or Frost Staff equipped, your Spell and Physical Resistance is increased by 1900.

cp_stars.name: Celerity
cp_stars.tooltip_raw: Increases your Movement Speed by 2% per stage.

cp_stars.name: Pain's Refuge
cp_stars.tooltip_raw: Reduces your damage taken by up to 20% based on the number of negative effects you have.

cp_stars.name: Sustained by Suffering
cp_stars.tooltip_raw: Increases your Health, Magicka, and Stamina Recovery by 30 per stage while under the effects of a negative effect.

cp_stars.name: Bastion
cp_stars.tooltip_raw: Increases the effectiveness of your damage shields and damage against shielded enemies by 3% per stage.

cp_stars.name: Steed's Blessing
cp_stars.tooltip_raw: Increases your out of combat Movement Speed by 0.4% per stage.

cp_stars.name: War Mount
cp_stars.tooltip_raw: Improves your mastery with mounts, removing all mount Stamina costs.

cp_stars.name: Sustaining Shadows
cp_stars.tooltip_raw: Reduces the cost of sneak, invisibility, and crouch by 8% and increases Movement Speed while sneaking by 10%.
